definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: The insurance rate for such kind of risk will vary according to the kind.
sentences.chinese: 保险的范围写在基本保险单和各种险别的条款里。

sentences.english: For example, the cost of a one-year insurance policy paid in advance is a prepaid expense.
sentences.chinese: 今后要支付的一年期保险单就是一种预提费用。

sentences.english: Marine insurance policy includes "both to blame" collision clauses and fully covers the shipment.
sentences.chinese: 海运保险单包括负责船舶互撞条款和全部货载。

sentences.english: This insurance policy insures us against All Risks.
sentences.chinese: 本保险单为我们投保了一切险。

sentences.english: Your death benefit is the amount of life insurance plus the policy Account Value.
sentences.chinese: 你的死亡抚恤金是人寿保险和保险单账价值的总量。

sentences.english: There is no clear stipulation in Chinas Mortgage Law whether an insurance policy can be mortgaged.
sentences.chinese: 我国《担保法》没有明确规定保险单是否可用于质押。

sentences.english: The seller shall procure, at his own cost and in a transferable form, a policy of marine insurance.
sentences.chinese: 卖方应自费购买可转让的海运保险单。

sentences.english: How will insurance policies be updated or investment portfolios unmingled?
sentences.chinese: 如何更新保险单，或者划清组合投资？

sentences.english: Policies taken out in his name prove that he was fully insured.
sentences.chinese: 以他名下购买的各种保险单证明他是全保了的。

sentences.english: The current applications support only manual entry of the policy.
sentences.chinese: 当前的应用程序仅支持保险单的手工输入。

sentences.english: This is our best insurance policy.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们最佳的保险单。

sentences.english: Generally after the first year, the policy begins to increase cash value.
sentences.chinese: 通常在第一年之后，保险单就会开始增加现金价值。

sentences.english: Banks are only required to review the conditions of insurance as detailed on the face of the insurance document.
sentences.chinese: 仅要求银行审核保险单据表面详列的保险条件。

sentences.english: This helps identify unusual policy applications for underwriters.
sentences.chinese: 这有助于承保人确定异常的保险单申请。

sentences.english: For example, the cost of a one-year i urance policy paid in advance is a prepaid expe e.
sentences.chinese: 今后要支付的一年期保险单就是一种预提费用。

sentences.english: When the insurance policy matures, the insured person will receive the capital sum agreed.
sentences.chinese: 保险单到期时，投保人会得到一笔总括性付款。
